requests.name: Washing Machine (Top Loader)
requests.description:
Family of 4 with 2 young children requires a washing machine. Mother is a lady with special needs and maintaining employment has been challenging. Hope the family can be blessed with a washing machine.

Looking for top load washing machine with less than 5 years old.

Please contact me at 8388 7562.

Thank you.

requests.name: Fridge/ Refrigerator
requests.description: Mdm S, age 87, is an elderly client known to Thye Hua Kwan Moral Charities (THKMC) who was diagnosed with early dementia. The elderly is living alone in Ang Mo Kio and often asks others to buy groceries on her behalf. However, her fridge has broken down and requires a replacement. On behalf of the client, THKMC is seeking a donation of a fridge for storing of the client’s items. If you know of someone who is able to offer a fridge for donation, please contact caseworker Anthony at 96546542 or anthony.wang@thkmc.org.sg. We would appreciate if the donor can deliver the item to the client’s place at Blk 115 Ang Mo Kio Avenue 4 as the client’s financial application is still under process. For more information on THKMC, do visit: https://www.thkmc.org.sg

contact.org: THK Cluster Support @ Ang Mo Kio
contact.name: Anthony Wang

requests.name: Refrigerator
requests.description: Client's family is heavily affected financially by the Covid-19 situation. Their fridge had recently malfunctioned and will be removed on 7 Aug 2021. Hence, they will need a new halal fridge by then as they are Muslims. Client hopes for fridge to be in well condition so that they can keep it for the long run and save on future expenses.

contact.org: Fei Yue Family Service Centre @ Bukit Batok
contact.name: Shena Tan

requests.name: Portable aircon
requests.description: Client is a young parent, married with 2 young children (M5,F1) and is currently pregnant with her 3rd child. Due to Covid-19, client's husband is having difficulty finding a job. Client suffers from depression and having a hard time caregiving with daughter who has heart problems. She hopes that having portable aircon will allow her children to sleep better.

requests.name: Television
requests.description:
Client is a 50 year old male living in a 2 room rental flat. He has major depression and is faced with financial challenges as he is medically unfit for work. He hopes to purchase a television but have financial difficulty in affording it. 

He hopes that with some entertainment at home, he may keep himself engaged on days when negative emotions become overwhelming, thus allowing some rest from negative and difficult thoughts.

requests.name: Washing machine
requests.description: A family with a teenage child needs a washing machine as their existing one has broken down. It is challenging for the family to save up for a new washing machine. The family would like support from the donor to cover transport. Thank you.

requests.name: Washing Machine
requests.description: Family of 6 (with 4 young children) is unable to replace washing machine that has broken down unexpectedly. Parents' employment have been impacted by the heightened alert measures. Parents are now hand-washing clothes while caring for 4 young children (2 are under 2 years old). Having a working washing machine will allow parents to better attend to their children's needs.

contact.org: AMKFSC Community Services Ltd - Ang Mo Kio
contact.name: Pek Yan Zhan

requests.name: 40L Oven
requests.description:
THK Pan-Disability Centre is a Sheltered Workshop for adults with special need. They are trained with basic duties such as housekeeping and baking, in hopes that they are able to attain jobs in the open job market. 
To support our clients in the baking track, we will require 3×40L Oven that have been lightly use. 
Please let us know your preferred methods of collection/delivery. Thank you.

requests.name: Television
requests.description: Client is a 75 year old elderly, living in a 3 room HDB flat. Client’s husband has passed away and client has been living alone ever since. Client is seeking for a television to occupy her time and feel less isolated at home. For further liaison, do contact Nurul via whatsapp at 98598767 from Monday – Friday 9am – 5pm. Thank you.

requests.name: Gas Stove
requests.description: Client is living with her husband and 3 children, and have another child on the way. The family are struggling financially and have unstable employment. After a long stay in the hospital, her physical condition has deteriorated affecting her ability to cope with her daily activities of livings. 
Please consider to cover the installation costs of the washing machine and water pipe as well. Thank you.

requests.name: Electric oven
requests.description: We are requesting for a client who would need an oven as she is learning to bake on her free time, and hopes to eventually set up her own homebased business in the long term. She suffers from a genetic heart condition and is currently waiting to get a job as she was recently deemed fit for work. SSO has been supporting her financially in the meantime.

requests.name: CCTV
requests.description: Family consisting a single mother and her step-daughter living in a rental unit. Mother is currently unemployed due to a chronic health condition. Family experienced recent harassment and having a CCTV would help in monitoring the movements outside their home and increase their sense of safety.

requests.name: Washing machine
requests.description:
Single mother with 3 children requires a washing machine with a 13amp plug (normal 3-pin, not the rounded plug). Their old one has spoilt and they cannot afford to go laundromat daily to wash their clothes. 

They were previously given another washing machine but it comes with the 15amp pin (round ones) and they do not have the 15amp socket installed in the house, and cannot afford to install a new socket. As such, will need another washing machine suitable for the house.

Client requests for a working tv as his current tv is not functioning.

requests.name: Freezer
requests.description:
Freezer
Client is from a low-income family. recently husband's, who is sole breadwinner, his employment situation has not been very stable. She is looking for a freezer to store her fresh foods in however is unable to afford a new one. It would be helpful if they are able to receive one! Thank you :)

requests.name: Wheelchair
requests.description: Elderly lady with mobility issues, requires a wheelchair for her children to bring her out for her medical appointments.

requests.name: Mountain Bicycle
requests.description: The client is a person with mental health concerns, he needs to engage on activity to reduce stress and anxiety. This is one of the way he could release trapped condition. Seeking a kind donor to support the client.

requests.name: 4-wheeled Mobility Scooter
requests.description: Elderly grandmother has multiple health issues and is unfit for work. She requires a 4-wheeled Mobility Scooter to get around and is hoping to get a secondhand one in good condition.

requests.name: 4 wheeled Mobility Scooter
requests.description:
Client is a 51yo man who has Parkinson's Disease and recently suffered a stroke. As a result of his medical illnesses, wife is currently the solebreadwinner for the family of 7 (3 children and 2 elderly parents). 
In a bid to alleviate some of wife's burden, client is currently looking for jobs and if successful, would require a 4-wheel mobility scooter to travel to work.

requests.name: Motorised Scooter
requests.description:
Client is a cancer patient and staying alone. Client has some mobility issues. Thus, having a motorised scooter will allow client to go about his daily activities.

Note: Client can only use a motorised scooter that is able to support 100-150kg   in weight.

requests.name: electric wheelchair
requests.description:
client is requesting for an electric wheelchair due to mobility issues.
 

He recently developed a condition where all his bones are fusing together starting with his legs, and requires a wheelchair to get around. As he is losing mobility in his hands as well, an electric wheelchair would be more appropriate.

requests.name: Motorized Wheelchair Needed for Elderly Client!
requests.description: Client is an elderly woman with limited mobility. She is presently residing alone and is dependent on others when she utilizes her manual wheelchair. The motorized wheelchair will help her to regain her personal independence and enable her to fulfil her day-to-day needs and errands with more ease.

requests.name: Mobility Scooter
requests.description:
Client, 49F, works as a Grabfood deliverer. She is a divorcee and has two children living with her, aged 20M and 16F. She has been using a second-hand mobility scooter with faulty brakes, which has posed as a physical safety concern for her. She suffers from eroded knee joint cartilage on both knees which had been impacted from having to use her legs to control the speed when slowing down. She is also diagnosed with asthma/chronic obstructive pulmonary disease and is on regular inhalers. She gets short of breath when she walks long distances and hence, is heavily reliant on her mobility scooter. 

Client is looking for a replacement mobility scooter that has working brakes. She is open to having a second-hand one as well.

contact.org: Care Corner Family Service Centre - Toa Payoh
contact.name: Merissa Boh

requests.name: Motorize wheelchair
requests.description: Client is an elderly man with diabetes. Due to water retention he is not able to walk very well. His elderly wife is unable to push him on a wheelchair, and he has a frozen shoulder, making it difficult to wheel himself. As such, he would like to request for a motorized wheelchair so he can move around more easily

Patient is bed-bound, hence she has some bowel movement difficulty and doctor has recommended the use of 2 packets of forlax on a daily basis.

The item can be found on Lazada: https://www.lazada.sg/products/bundle-of-2-boxes-forlax-10g-sachet-20s-i606574013.html .

Kindly arrange the donated items to be delivered to patient’s house directly. You can contact Jia Ling at 82479135 via WhatsApp for more details. Thank you.

requests.name: 20 office Pedestals with key lock

The Helping Hand is a Voluntary Welfare Organization affiliated with the National Council of Social Service. We run a home providing drug rehabilitation and after-care services to male drug addicts and ex-offenders in Singapore. This is a residential programme carried out in our agency home, which was graciously provided by the Singapore government in recognition of our services to the community. We are serving about 100 residents at our premises.

requests.name: Enfamil A+ AR, Infant Formula, Stage 1 (900g)
requests.description: Child, 10 months old, diagnosed with down syndrome. He is dependent on CPAP, NGT and oxygen breathing device. He comes from a family of 7. Father is the main breadwinner, while mother (alongside helper) are the main caregivers. The 4 other children are all of school going age. The family has been very supportive and attentive to the child's needs. However, given his condition, the doctor has recommended for child to drink a specific milk brand to optimise his nutrition intake.

requests.name: Milk Powder
requests.description: Client is the grandmother to the child who is 3 months old. She is working as a grabdriver and her husband is working as a taxi driver. They are also supporting 2 teenaged children of their own. Client's eldest son and daughter-in-law were involved in a police case and were both sentenced and serving a jail term, as such, she has took up the responsibility of raising her grandchild. She is unable to work regularly as she needs to care for the baby and family is relying on husband's sole income. She hopes to receive some support for milk powder and diapers so as to defray the cost of living.

contact.org: Touch Community Services - Touch Family Enablement
contact.name: Neo Xiao Hui

requests.name: Baby Detergent
requests.description:
Young family of 4 expecting a baby girl in Aug 2021 (Husband got a massive pay cut due to the Covid-19 pandemic).

Baby Detergent 
Nursing Bra (XL) 
 
Please feel free to call/whatsapp me at 90578359 if you would like to make a donation!

requests.name: XXL diapers - 4 packs
requests.description: Family of 6, with 3 young children and 1 newborn. Mother is unable to work at the moment as she recent gave birth. Father is sole breadwinner for the family, with low income.

requests.name: (Milk Powder) S-26 Gold Progress (Stage 3)

requests.name: Adult Absorbent Protector

requests.name: Sebamed Liquid Face & Body Wash for sensitive skin
requests.description: Client is requesting for Sebamed Liquid Face & Body Wash for sensitive skin. It is meant for her granddaughter whom she is caring for. They are living in a rental flat and has financial support but is not able to purchase the retail item for the granddaughter's need due to sensitive skin condition.

requests.name: QuickVue At-Home OTC COVID-19 Test (25 Tests/Kit)
requests.description:
In line with the present COVID-19 situation, our organisation, The Helping Hand has added layer of ringfencing to help to identify cases and prevent further transmission, we have started conducting mandatory Covid-19 testing to all residents and staff since 15th July 2021.
The Helping Hand is a Voluntary Welfare Organization affiliated with the National Council of Social Service. We run a home providing drug rehabilitation and after-care services to male drug addicts and ex-offenders in Singapore. This is a residential programme carried out in our agency home, which was graciously provided by the Singapore government in recognition of our services to the community. 
We have a total of about 100 residents and staff staying in at our premise. We are using the QuickVue At-Home OTC COVID-19 Test (25 Tests/Kit).

Here is the link for the requested item, thank you for your kindness.

https://www.guardian.com.sg/quickvue-at-home-otc-covid-19-test-25-tests-kit/p/619909

requests.name: Size XL Diapers (Tape)
requests.description: Client is a cancer patient on palliative care. She has been bed-ridden for the past few months and requires full-time caregiving. Her husband is the primary caregiver, and he had given up his full-time job to care for the client. The couple depends on social assistance and are frugal in their spending. The client requires diapers and this incur additional expenses for the family. The couple has a son who is in Primary 5.

requests.name: TENA Super XL Pants
requests.description:
Patient is a 42 years old male who is single and living with his elderly mother in a two-room HDB rental flat. His mother is his main caregiver. He requires assistance with his daily activities and is totally dependent. The family does not have any income and is reliant on various assistances for daily subsistence. Thus, the family has difficulty affording the ongoing consumables for patient.

Patient uses TENA Super XL Pants. The item can be found here: https://www.watsons.com.sg/pants-super-adult-diapers-xl-12s/p/BP_57783 (Watsons) or https://www.guardian.com.sg/tena-pants-super-xl-12pcs/p/171935 (Guardian).

Kindly arrange the donated items to be delivered to patient’s house directly. You can WhatsApp Jia Ling at 82479135 for details. Thank you!

requests.name: Laptop
requests.description: Family with 2 schooling children need a working laptop for their school work and home base learning.

offers.name: Poppy Seat - rigid seat and table cover for weaning
offers.description:
- Food is most likely to stay in place: the mat is wide enough for infants not to reach the edges and flip it over themselves, it has risen edges for liquids not to pour into our laps and suction cups that keep it stuck to the table top

- Easy to use, store and bring along: can fit almost any chair, whether with a backrest or not, with harness or not, at the table or using the chair feeding tray; it folds and unfolds fast, cleans up well after messy eating, and you can store utensils and other items in the pockets

- Looks good and saves you from embarrassing messes when eating outside home

The cover containing the harness is connected to the pillow and can be inserted in a compartment at the back when not in use. 
UNILOVE 4-in-1 Pillow (Maternity Bolster + Nursing Pillow + Baby Nest with Harness + Cot Liner/Bumper)

The harness is fastened using Velcro, but it's meant to fit loosely. It won't stop a 4-6mo from rolling around, only a newborn who started kicking about.
